languages.text: "Нет преград в изучении Слов Императора и завоевании мира, который он нам подарил. Читали нашего рукописца, Горгориуса Фальта? Я слышал, что он закончил свою карьеру... Но его исследования — истинный свет поклонения!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"
languages.original_text: "Нет преград в изучении Слов Императора и завоевании мира, который он нам подарил. Читали нашего рукописца, Горгориуса Фальта? Я слышал, что он закончил свою карьеру... Но его исследования — истинный свет поклонения!"

traits.locale_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... But his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... But his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

"There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

languages.text: “有了知识，我们便可以毫无障碍地学习帝皇的真理，战胜祂赐予我们的一切阻碍。不知您有没有读过我们的缮写员戈里乌斯·法尔特的手稿？我听说他的手艺已经生疏了……不过，他的研究闪耀着真正的信仰之光！”
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: “有了知识，我们便可以毫无障碍地学习帝皇的真理，战胜祂赐予我们的一切阻碍。不知您有没有读过我们的缮写员戈里乌斯·法尔特的手稿？我听说他的手艺已经生疏了……不过，他的研究闪耀着真正的信仰之光！”

languages.text: 「皇帝の御言葉を学ぶことにも、陛下が授けたすべてを征服することにも、妨げるものは何もないのです。書記官ゴルゴリウス・ファルトの写本をお読みになったことはありますか？今では筆を置いたと聞いておりますが…彼の研究は真の信仰の光とともに輝き続けています！」
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の御言葉を学ぶことにも、陛下が授けたすべてを征服することにも、妨げるものは何もないのです。書記官ゴルゴリウス・ファルトの写本をお読みになったことはありますか？今では筆を置いたと聞いておりますが…彼の研究は真の信仰の光とともに輝き続けています！」

languages.text: «No existen impedimentos para estudiar la palabra del Emperador y dominar todo cuanto Él nos ha otorgado. ¿Ha leído los manuscritos del escriba Gorgorius Falt? Dicen que ya ha renunciado a su oficio... ¡pero su investigación brilla con la luz de la verdadera devoción!».
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: «No existen impedimentos para estudiar la palabra del Emperador y dominar todo cuanto Él nos ha otorgado. ¿Ha leído los manuscritos del escriba Gorgorius Falt? Dicen que ya ha renunciado a su oficio... ¡pero su investigación brilla con la luz de la verdadera devoción!».

languages.text: "İmparator'un sözünü öğrenmenin ve O'nun bize bahşettiği her şeyi fethetmenin önünde hiçbir engel duramaz. Kâtibimiz Gorgorius Falt'un el yazmalarını okumuş muydunuz? Duyduğum kadarıyla zanaatını bırakmış... Araştırmalarıysa gerçek ibadetin ışığıyla parıldıyor!"
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un sözünü öğrenmenin ve O'nun bize bahşettiği her şeyi fethetmenin önünde hiçbir engel duramaz. Kâtibimiz Gorgorius Falt'un el yazmalarını okumuş muydunuz? Duyduğum kadarıyla zanaatını bırakmış... Araştırmalarıysa gerçek ibadetin ışığıyla parıldıyor!"

languages.text: « Rien ne doit s'opposer à la connaissance de la parole de l'Empereur et à la conquête de tout ce qu'Il nous a donné. Avez-vous lu les manuscrits de notre scribe, Gorgorius Falt ? Il paraît qu'il a désormais renoncé à son art... mais ses recherches brillent encore de la lumière de la véritable dévotion ! »
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: « Rien ne doit s'opposer à la connaissance de la parole de l'Empereur et à la conquête de tout ce qu'Il nous a donné. Avez-vous lu les manuscrits de notre scribe, Gorgorius Falt ? Il paraît qu'il a désormais renoncé à son art... mais ses recherches brillent encore de la lumière de la véritable dévotion ! »

languages.text: "Es gibt keine Grenzen für das Wort des Imperators und die Eroberung von allem, was Er uns gegeben hat. Habt Ihr die Manuskripte unseres Schreibers Gorgorius Falt gelesen? Angeblich geht er seiner Kunst jetzt nicht mehr nach ... aber seine Forschung erstrahlt weiterhin im Licht wahrer Anbetung!"
languages.original_text: "There are no barriers to learning the word of the Emperor and to conquering all that He has given unto us. Have you read the manuscripts of our scribe, Gorgorius Falt? I hear he has left his craft behind now... but his research shines on with the light of true worship!"

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keine Grenzen für das Wort des Imperators und die Eroberung von allem, was Er uns gegeben hat. Habt Ihr die Manuskripte unseres Schreibers Gorgorius Falt gelesen? Angeblich geht er seiner Kunst jetzt nicht mehr nach ... aber seine Forschung erstrahlt weiterhin im Licht wahrer Anbetung!"
